column2: Today I have been strolling through the woods and thinking about my family. Some of them are truly important to me... others not so much. In the end, I have certainly gained a better understanding of my feelings towards each one of them.
'...familia est omnia pro quam vivo et moriar'.
There has been a marriage in my court. Some expenses have been sustained to arrange the ceremony and to find a suitable accomodation for the newcomers.
Today I have gotten married and I have finally met the other members of my spouse's family...
I love my wife. My in-laws, not so much...
I love my husband. My in-laws, not so much...
